author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Pepin returns to Trackside
text:
Oct 12, 2015 Pat Pepin 
Rockland — Blues saxophonist Pat Pepin rocked Trackside Station during July’s North Atlantic Blues Festival and will return for night only — Friday, Oct. 23. She will perform during dinner, from 6 to 9 p.m. 
The show is free and open to all ages. Trackside Station is located at 4 Union St. For reservations for groups of six or more, call 594-7500. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
